Speaking & media

I regularly give talks on decision-making under uncertainty, how ideas and behaviours spread, and what data can (and can't) tell us about the future. As a TED Senior Fellow, I combine academic rigour with accessible storytelling to deliver talks that resonate with diverse audiences.

I've spoken at leading tech companies, financial institutions, professional services firms, Premier League football clubs, and major festivals. Please e-mail speaking[at]kucharski.io for enquiries.

Media coverage

My research and writing been profiled by media outlets including The Guardian, Wired, The New York Times, The Times, El País, and O Globo.

I have contributed to documentaries including BBC Horizon, and given interviews to broadcasters including BBC News, Channel 4 News, CBS, CNN, ITV News, and Sky News.
